### Brief Description
Amendment 002 is issued to include questions and answers. The Department of Justice Canada has a requirement for office seating to be delivered and installed in Ottawa, Ontario, by July 31, 2024.

### Requirements
• Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid.
• Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders can submit a bid but must also apply for a supply arrangement.
• The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies.
• The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Notice of Scheduled Tender Closing

A procurement notice has been issued by the Department of Justice Canada for the purchase, delivery, and installation of 54 rotary seats and stools to be delivered in Ottawa, Ontario, by 14:00:00 on May 31, 2024. The contract has a value greater than $100,000.

Please note that the following documentation will be attached: 

* Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) 
* Amendments and Questions and Answers
